mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (productNo, sellerName, productName, modelName, customerPrice, sellPrice, purchasePrice, categoryCode, productMainImg, productSubImg1, productSubImg2, productSubImg3, productExpImg, clickTotalCount ) VALUES (#{productNo}, #{sellerName}, #{productName}, #{modelName}, #{customerPrice}, #{sellPrice}, #{purchasePrice}, #{categoryCode}, #{productMainImg}, #{productSubImg1}, #{productSubImg2}, #{productSubImg3}, #{productExpImg}, '0')
